Title: LAKE CUSHMAN - WESTSIDE BEACH LOT
Ad: Stunning, rarely available and undervalued beachfront lot on the shores of Lake Cushman . Get away from the city to your own private 1.5 acre vacation hideaway, less than 2 hours drive from Seattle and 1 hour from Olympia. Swim, water ski, hike and enjoy outside recreational activities year round. The lake is large and deep and is fed by snow run-off from the high peaks of the Olympic Mountains and is the perfect temperature for recreation come summer. The property has been used for weddings and parties, taking advantages of the private beachfront and BBQ play areas. Free parking for the owner and guests. The property is buildable . Owner wants quick sale. Serious offers only.
